resources.string: "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
This function is not available when using the Baby Monitor function.
"Could not connect to the server. The notification function cannot be used."
Bracketed shooting suspended because flash was unable recharge.
An error occurred during communication with the camera.
Due to an error, some images were not saved.
The card is locked. Unlock it.
Connection information of wireless access point (SSID)
Send Images Stored in the Camera
Do not show this screen again.
"Only videos in the following formats can be played back on a TV. \"848x480/30p(25p) \" \"848x480/240fps(200fps) \" \"1280x720/30p(25p) \" \"1280x720/120fps(100fps) \""
"Only videos in the following format can be played back on a TV. \"640x480/30p \""
"Only videos in the following formats can be played back on a TV. \"848x480/30p(25p) \" and \"848x480/240fps(200fps) \"."
Switched to recording mode using the camera.
Switched to recording mode on the camera.
Selected scene cannot be played on the TV.
Videos in MP4 1920x1080/60p (50p) format cannot be played back on a TV.
"This camera's MP4 contents cannot be played on a TV."
Press the button again to exit the application.
"Connection to the camera was lost. Set the Wi-Fi connection for the camera again."
Connection to the camera was lost.
There is no response from the camera. Redo the Wi-Fi settings on the camera, or move to a location where the wireless signal reception is better and tap the \"OK \" button.
"Connection to the camera was lost or recording mode was ended. Set the Wi-Fi connection with the camera again or copy images."
"Connection to the camera was lost or recording mode was ended. Copying images is possible."
The connection to the playback device was interrupted.
"Not connected to the Internet. Connect to Internet."
"Shooting failed. Check the camera or memory card."
"Cannot load \"Help \" because your smartphone is not connected to Internet. Connect to Internet."
To shoot using Jump Snap, set the camera to \"Single \".
Install [LUMIX LINK] on your smartphone/tablet to connect to the selected camera.
The current mode cannot be changed at the moment because recording is in progress on the camera.
Connection is not possible because video recording is in progress on the camera.
Recording a video using the camera...
This function is temporarily unavailable while the camera is performing another operation.
This function is not available at the moment.
This function is not available during video recording.
This function is not available during still picture recording.
This function cannot be used while pictures are now being downloaded from the camera.
This function cannot be used at the moment because picture registration is in progress.
This function is not available while using the self-timer.
This function is not available while using the remote voice function.
Video recording is not possible at the moment because recording is in progress on the camera.
"This operation cannot be executed when the digital camera's Snap Movie function is set to ON. Set Snap Movie to OFF to use this app."
Upload to the Cloud Folder is available, after Cloud Sync setting has been done on downloadable devices such as PC or smartphone.
A Cloud Folder stores transferred images for 30 days (up to 1000 pictures). Transferred images are deleted automatically 30 days after the transfer.
When the download of images from a Cloud Folder to all specified devices is complete, images may be deleted from the Cloud Folder even within 30 days after the transfer.
The QR code could not be read.
Position the QR code within the frame and capture it.
Insufficient capacity on the card. You need at least 60 minutes remaining to record in this mode.
Select a camera to connect to.
"Cannot connect to the camera. In Wi-Fi settings, check that a camera to connect to is selected."
This function cannot be used at this time.
This function cannot be used at this time. Confirm the Wi-Fi settings of your camera and your smartphone, and then select the camera under \"Set connect dest. \".
"Cannot find a camera to connect to. Select a camera to connect to from the menu."
"Check the device's Wi-Fi settings to confirm that you have selected a camera to connect to."
The connection may take several minutes.
Select an access point to connect to.
This is a notification from Image App.
This is a notification from Image Shuttle.
To connect to the camera, please start from the beginning.
Touch the NFC mark on the camera with your smartphone.
(3) Execute the \"Connection Test \" function on the camera.
The LUMIX CLUB login ID already registered in the camera
A LUMIX CLUB login ID is already registered in this camera.
The smartphone-to-camera Wi-Fi functions have been initialized.
In order to use the Live Cast function, the following additional operations must also be performed.
* In order to use the Live Cast, Baby Monitor and DLNA functions, you need to register first.
* If you do not already have a LUMIX CLUB login ID and a password, use a PC or other device to obtain a LUMIX CLUB login ID and a password beforehand.
Register your Wi-Fi network into the camera.
Registers your LUMIX CLUB login ID and password in the camera.
If the devices are already synchronized, you can skip this step. To re-synchronize the devices, touch Next.
To continue using that login ID, touch Skip. To change it, touch Next.
The same SSID was registered previously.
"The smartphone's clock and the camera's clock will be synchronized."
Select the item you want to set.
[Settings performed via a PC or other device]
Log in to LUMIX CLUB, select Web service link settings, and set USTREAM.
(2) Set Web service link (USTREAM) on LUMIX CLUB
"Please choose Access point to connect. When Access point has not been registered yet, please select the first available blank row (above) to register the wireless access point."
The information acquired from the camera is incorrect.
"The login ID is registered in the camera. Do you want to overwrite it?"

"Registers the access point in the camera.
If you use an access point, register it beforehand.
* In order to use the Live Cast, Baby Monitor and DLNA functions, you need to register first."

"Registers the access point in the camera.
If you use an access point, register it beforehand.
* In order to use the Live Cast and DLNA functions, you need to register first."

"Registers the access point in the camera.
If you use an access point, register it beforehand.
* In order to use the DLNA functions, you need to register first."

"The smartphone's clock and the camera's clock will be synchronized.
Current time on the camera %1$s
Current time on the smartphone %2$s
If the devices are already synchronized, you can skip this step. To re-synchronize the devices, touch Next."
Information acquisition from the camera failed.

"Registers your LUMIX CLUB login ID and password in the camera.
* If you do not already have a LUMIX CLUB login ID and a password, use a PC or other device to obtain a LUMIX CLUB login ID and a password beforehand.
%s
To continue using that login ID, touch Skip. To change it, touch Next."
Enter your login ID and your password.

"The smartphone-to-camera settings have been completed.
In order to use the Live Cast function, the following additional operations must also be performed.
[Settings performed via a PC or other device] (1) Obtain an USTREAM ID
(2) Set Web service link (USTREAM) on LUMIX CLUB Log in to LUMIX CLUB, select Web service link settings, and set USTREAM.
[Confirmation on the camera] (3) Execute the \"Connection Test \" function on the camera."

"The smartphone-to-camera settings have been completed.
In order to use the Live Cast function, the following additional operations must also be performed.
[Settings performed via a PC or other device] (1) Obtain an USTREAM ID
(2) Set Web service link (USTREAM) on LUMIX CLUB Log in to LUMIX CLUB, select Web service link settings, and set USTREAM. "
Internet access is required to launch [%s].
Internet access is required to install [%s].
If your smartphone is currently connected to the camera, directly, please disconnect so that Internet access is available. Relaunch the app.
"A still picture is created by combining the best shots that are automatically selected from the recorded scene by the video camera."
Smartphone/tablet location information will be added to the picture.
You can extract highlights from several scenes, play them, and save them as a short video.
You can monitor the conditions in your home while you are away.
You can create a single picture by combining your favorite still pictures.
A still picture and video sharing site where you can “organize, share, and display” still pictures and videos recorded using the digital camera
You can combine videos that you shot with the camera in Snap Movie mode
You can use a previously taken still picture as the background for the next picture and take the next still picture superimposed on the background.
Save the current location information to the picture file?
The connected camera does not support Location Logging.
"The location data could not be saved. The location data has been transferred to the camera."
"To turn Location Logging ON, the GPS function must be enabled. Enable the GPS function?"
"Location Logging will be turned OFF. Change GPS function setting as well?"
The connected camera must support location logging. Send location data?
The connected camera must support location logging. Perform time synchronization?
The SD card is protected. Release the protection.
Syncing time with your mobile device
\"Rec. loc. Info \" has been turned OFF.
\"Rec. loc. Info \" has been turned ON.
Location data sent to the camera.
Cannot use GPS function with this unit.
The recording has been stopped due to a write error.
This file cannot be used to create highlights.
This file cannot be used to create highlights, since the contents of the file are copyright protected.
When enabled, you can specify the background music at run time.
When enabled, you can specify the title picture at run time.
No music file has been selected. Are you sure you want to start creating highlights without selecting a music file?
No picture has been selected. Do you want to create highlights without setting a title picture?
Since Bookmarking is up to Max 40, you cannot set any more.

"Motion stopped - camera switched to 4K burst mode.
Please allow the camera to cool down."

"Motion stopped - camera switched to 6K burst mode.
Please allow the camera to cool down."
"The login ID for the camera has been set. Do you want to use the camera's login ID for this app as well?"
"The login ID for the camera has not been set. Do you want to use the same login ID as for this app?"
Copy short video(s) shot %d day(s) ago in Snap Movie mode?
Copy short video(s) shot today in Snap Movie mode?
"Create video? This will take approx. %d minutes."
Delete the currently displayed camera files?
Delete the currently displayed camera files? (Protected files will not be deleted.)
The LUMIX CLUB login ID has been registered in the camera. Copy the LUMIX CLUB login ID from the camera to this application?
The LUMIX CLUB login ID has been registered in this application. Copy the LUMIX CLUB login ID from this application to the connected camera?
The LUMIX CLUB login ID has been registered in the camera. Copy the LUMIX CLUB login ID from this application to the camera?
"\"Picture Share \" settings have not been performed. Perform them now?"
Register the login ID in the camera?
Use the same picture aspect ratio and quality as for the last recording?
The Wi-Fi connection will be interrupted in a few minutes due to overheating inside the camera.
Connect camera via Wi-Fi to receive images from the camera (automatic image transfer)?
Shutter Remote Control cannot be used when the camera is in the automatic image transfer.
Turn on the power supply switch of the camera.
"Shutter Remote Control cannot be used when the camera is Wi-Fi connected. Terminate the Wi-Fi connection of the camera?"
The name of the smartphone displayed in the camera can be changed.
The entered name of the smartphone is too long.
The camera is establishing a connection with another smartphone or tablet.
The settings of the connected camera were initialized.
The camera battery capacity is low. The power of the camera will turn OFF.
"Could not be connected to the access point. Registration has not been completed."
"Connection rejected by camera. Registration has not been completed."
"Communication with the camera is not possible. Start all over again."
"Data cannot be saved any more. Delete the saved camera settings."
The SD card is protected. Release the protection.
This operation cannot be performed as the picture is protected. First release the protection.
This function cannot be used for images shorter than 3 seconds.
This function is not available, since no LUMIX CLUB login ID has been registered.
This function is not available, since there is no connection to the Internet.
This function is not available when directly connected to the camera, or when there is no connection to the Internet.
This function is not available at the moment.
\"Picture Share \" settings have not been registered.
Registration is not possible, since certification is not complete.
Partial deletion not possible at this point.
The connection destination priority order set using WPS cannot be changed.
This function cannot be used now because maintenance is being performed on the camera card.
"Communication with the camera is not possible. If pairing has been completed at the camera, release the pairing, and then start all over again."
Communication with the camera is not possible. Check whether the pairing has been canceled on the camera side.
"Communication with the camera is not possible. Select it again."
It is not possible to connect to an access point during Bluetooth tethering.
Camera cannot be connected as \"Pairing \" has not been set by the camera. Register the camera again.
Cannot create a video because the recording spans two SD cards.
This function cannot be used due to a problem with the SD card.
This function cannot be used because the data on the SD card is being recoverd.
There is no SD card inserted in the camera.
Formatting not possible due to problems with the SD card.
The SD card is protected. Release the protection.
Formatting not possible because the data on SD card is being recoverd.
This function is not available, since the format is not supported.
Could not read content because maintenance is being performed on the camera card.
Backup recording requires using two identical SD cards.
"The camera cannot be registered any more. Cancel the registered cameras."

"Due to the state of the camera, this function cannot be used. Make sure the camera is not in operation. When connected to the camera via Wi-Fi, check the connection access point in the Wi-Fi settings."
Switched to videos that can be used with the Highlight Playback function.
Switched to videos that can be used with the Highlight Photo Collage function.
The Bluetooth connection with the camera was lost.
As camera is in operation, this function cannot be used at the moment.
Terminate the Wi-Fi connection of the camera.
Communication with the camera is not possible.
"Communication with the camera is not possible. Select it again."
Cloud backup by camera in progress...
Access point is not registered in the camera. Register the access point.
"Back up camera images to the cloud via the access point. To configure the settings for cloud backup, turn on the power supply of the camera, and then connect via Bluetooth."
"Backup camera images to the cloud via the access point. To configure the settings for cloud backup, turn on the power supply of the camera."
An error is occurring during communication with the camera.
The same LUMIX CLUB login ID as the camera has been registered.
Connect to another smartphone and receive images at that smartphone?
Check if there is any problem with the communication environment.
Connect to the access point below in Wi-Fi Setup.
Use [LUMIX Sync] for the camera to connect to.
"The camera is already in use. Select another camera."
"The camera is already in use. Select another camera, or switch off the camera's Wi-Fi connection, and then turn it back on."
"Cannot connect to the camera. Check the Wi-Fi settings."
Could not be connected to the access point.
Could not connect to the server.
Connect to the access point below.
App usage conditions will be sent automatically to the server. This setting can be changed later.
"Registration was canceled. Release the pairing on the camera as well."
Connection with the camera has been cut off.

" [Notice for users connecting the camera to a DLNA device] For videos that are to be played back on a DLNA-compatible TV, set the recording mode to \"848x480/30p(25p) \".
Setting method: Select \"Menu \" -> \"Record Setup \" -> \"Normal shooting mode \", and then select \"Rec Mode \" -> \"848x480/30p(25p) \"."
To complete the registration, %s needs to be Wi-Fi connected.
"The camera needs to be Wi-Fi connected. Enable Wi-Fi?"
This function cannot be used because the picture format is not supported on your smartphone or tablet.
This function cannot be used because the picture format is not supported on your smartphone or tablet, or the available storage space is insufficient.
Copying the LUMIX CLUB login ID failed. Check the connection to the camera.
The AF+MF function cannot be used, because the picture is not in focus.
Could not connect to the camera. Please update this application.
Could not connect to the camera. Check the camera to be connected.
Could not connect to the camera. Check the device ID and the password.
The highlights file could not be copied. Try creating the highlights again, using a lower picture quality format.
The connection to the camera has been interrupted. Please wait a moment before retrying.
"The connection to the camera was interrupted while checking the recorded picture. The recorded picture was saved automatically."
Recording is not possible, because the maximum number of scenes have already been recorded. Create a new Stop Motion project.
No new Stop Motion picture can be created because the date folder and Stop Motion recording group is already full.
This function cannot be used while the Remote Pan Tilt Cradle is connected.
An error occurred during communication with LUMIX CLUB.
This function is not available, since the Terms of use could not be obtained.
An error occurred during uploading. Confirm that you can access the Internet.
The specified picture cannot be uploaded, because the data could not be read.
"Picture transfer failed. Confirm that the application with the transfer destination feature has been installed."
Picture upload failed. Confirm that you have completed the AV device registration with the LUMIX CLUB.
"New registration failed. Enter a string of 8 – 16 characters with a mix of letters and digits."
"Enter a string of 8 – 16 characters with a mix of letters and digits."
"AV device registration failed. Confirm that the entered address number/access number is registered with LUMIX CLUB. For details, refer to the operating instructions of the AV device used."
Cannot upload files because connection to Internet is not set.
"You must agree to the terms of use to use this application. If you agree, please tap the \"Agree \" button."
"The terms of use of this application have been updated. You must agree to the terms of use to continue using this application. If you agree, please tap the \"Agree \" button."
An error occurred while copying images.
Change to AF mode for post focus.
Focus position changed by any operations. The recording stopped.
This function is not supported by your device.
Location data from an earlier version is already present.
The location data must be updated in order to use it with this version.
Erase location data recorded by earlier version?
Camera operation cannot continue due to overheating. The power of the camera will turn OFF.
Tap the record button to cancel the exposure.
\"Picture Share \" settings can be performed using the following procedure.
When you have completed all the items, press Complete.
Press “Login” after all fields are completed.
Press “Register” after all fields are completed.
Press “Register” after all fields are completed.
Press “Set” after all fields are completed.
The NFC settings on the camera are invalid. Please correct the settings.
"The camera starts to create a black frame image for Noise Reduction after shutter button is pressed."
"Live View Composite starts after shutter button is pressed."
"Creating black frame image for Noise Reduction. Please wait."
"Noise Reduction is in process. Please wait."
"Change to recording mode? (The lens may extend.)"
"Location information cannot be obtained. Enable [Location Services]."
Insufficient capacity on the card. You need at least 60 minutes remaining to record in this mode.
Recording was automatically stopped since 24 hours had passed since the start of recording.
This function cannot be used when stored picture confirmation is in progress.
"The current project will be terminated, and the recording will be performed as a new project. Are you sure you want to continue?"
Formatting failed. This SD card needs to be reformatted.
"The app can automatically select highlights from the scenes you have recorded, and save them with added effects. You can change the effects by modifying the settings."
Set the time on the camera.

As this application utilizes a service linked with LUMIX CLUB for uploads to web services, you must agree to the terms and conditions of the LUMIX CLUB services in order to upload files to web services.
"An SD card error was detected, but the data management information cannot be restored because the camera battery is low. Charge the battery. Press OK to turn off the camera."
The SSID can only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols. (Up to 32 characters.)
The password can only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols. (0, 5, or 8 – 64 characters.)
The SSID can only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols. (1 – 32 characters.)
The password can only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols. (8 – 64 characters.)
Establish a Wi-Fi connection with this smartphone?
Connect to this smartphone via Wi-Fi?
Touch the NFC mark on the camera again to connect with your smartphone.
If the camera to connect to is compatible with NFC, touch the NFC mark on the camera body with your smartphone.
If you are using an NFC-compatible camera model, touch the NFC mark on the camera screen with your smartphone.
"Touching failed. Depending on the camera's operating conditions, touching the NFC indicator may not be possible. Select the device you want to connect to from the list."
"NFC processing failed. The NFC function may not work, depending on the operating conditions of the camera."
"NFC processing failed. The necessary information could not be obtained."
"NFC processing failed. The touch may have been interrupted during NFC processing. Try touching a while longer."
Turn the power of the camera ON, and then touch again.
Enable the NFC function on the camera, and then touch again.
"NFC processing failed. The picture may be unsupported. Select another picture and try touching again."
* If “%s” is displayed on the LCD of the connected camera, select “YES”and when prompt on the unit touch your smartphone to your camera.
* If “%s” is displayed on the LCD of the connecting camera, select “YES” and then touch the camera with your smartphone again.
If it is not NFC-compatible, please wait.
No connection to the camera. Please touch it again.
There is no SD card inserted in the camera.
Different LUMIX CLUB login IDs are already set for the camera and this application.
There is no LUMIX CLUB login ID set for the camera and this application.
There are no matching pictures to copy.
No password entered. Do you want to apply settings anyway?
This function is not supported by the current OS version of your device.
Connection is not possible at this time, since the camera is sending location data.
Connecting to camera or waiting for pictures to be sent from the camera.
Copying the LUMIX CLUB login ID...
"Searching camera… Close this dialog/app and select camera’s SSID for direct connection from Wi-Fi list."
"Searching camera… Close this dialog/app and select camera’s SSID for direct connection from Wi-Fi list."
"Searching for the camera or waiting for pictures to be sent from the camera."
"Searching or waiting for camera to transmit pictures. Close this dialog/app and select camera’s SSID for direct connection from Wi-Fi list."
"Searching or waiting for camera to transmit pictures. Close this dialog/app and select camera’s SSID for direct connection from Wi-Fi list."
Acquiring information on other Web services associated with LUMIX CLUB...
Operate the camera to set it to standby for \"Pairing \".
Connection is not possible, as the camera is performing a Pan/Tilt Check.
You can use picture frames extracted from a video to make a photo collage.
Exit without saving the current picture?
"Folder creation failed. Enter another folder name and try again."
The specified folder name already exists. Do you want to add the pictures to that folder?
Please enter the folder name using up to %d single-byte characters.
The information for the selected picture(s) will be cleared. Are you sure you want to continue?
Cannot upload the selected image because it is too large.
Set the [Auto Transfer] setting of the camera to OFF.
"Playback may not be possible on your smartphone, depending on the model. Copy?"
Pictures in formats not supported by the smartphone will be excluded. Do you want to continue?
"Shoot SH1 PRE (super high-speed Pre-Burst) with the camera shutter. SH1 (super high-speed burst) can be shot from this application."
"Shoot SH2 PRE (super high-speed Pre-Burst) with the camera shutter. SH2 (super high-speed burst) can be shot from this application."

"Pre-burst stopped.
Please allow the camera to cool down."
App usage conditions will be sent automatically to the server. This setting can be changed later.
Camera (%s) is connected to another smartphone.
The camera to connect to must be compatible with the QR code reading function. Continue?
If your device has a QR scanner, tap the following button.
To scan the QR code for the Home Monitor function, open the menu and select Application function > Home Cam > Set Connect. Dest., and then press the QR code button.
"Images that can be configured to ★5 only will be configured to ★5. Do you want to continue?"
Cannot be set on this picture.
Depending on the OS of the smartphone, RAW files may not be displayed correctly.
Images and sound cannot be output while recording a slow motion video.
Selected images were saved to the unsent image list. Upload the files from the unsent image list after connecting to the Internet.
Disconnect the Internet connection in Bluetooth Setup, and then connect to the access point below in Wi-Fi Setup.
"Touching failed. Depending on the camera's operating conditions, touching the NFC indicator may not be possible."
Confirm the ID and the password of the camera you want to connect to.
Confirm that the wireless LAN access point that the camera is connected to is connected to the Internet.
Normal camera communication is not possible at the moment, or your network environment may not allow the use of the Home Monitor function.
The line is busy. Please try again later.
"Live control quality is [QVGA]. You can change the [Live Control quality] setting under [Live Control Settings] in the [Menu]."
Cannot find a camera to be connected. Check the Wi-Fi setup.
Content saved to Gallery. Quit editing and confirm?
Data management information error. The data management information is being restored.
Select the camera to be connected.
This picture cannot be selected because the maximum duration of content that can be combined has been exceeded.
When the camera was operated and %s was selected, select \"Operate with camera \".
The specified function has not been selected with the camera.
The Home Monitor device ID has been registered in the smartphone. Do you want to overwrite it?
The Home Monitor device ID has been registered in the smartphone.
Which part is to be deleted?

The camera’s SSID and Wi-Fi password are set to the default values. Changing the SSID and Wi-Fi password is recommended. To change these settings, select “Camera Wi-Fi settings” → “Camera SSID settings.”
The set SSID/password will be reflected when the camera is turned OFF and then back ON again, or when the Wi-Fi connection with the camera is reestablished.
There are no images to backup.
Login is not possible. Check your login ID and password.
A communication error occurred. Try again.
Backup cannot be started because the camera is in sleep mode.
Cannot connect to upload destination. Check the settings of the upload destination.
Backup cannot be started because the camera is charging.
This function cannot be used when stored picture confirmation is in progress.
A new Stop Motion picture will be created. If you create a new project, no further recordings can be added to the current recording group. Are you sure you want to continue?
"The recording mode has been changed. Backup for Twin Camera cannot be performed in this recording mode."
Backup for Twin Camera will be cancelled.
The camera’s NFC function is disabled.
Location data has already been assigned to this picture.
Could not send location data to the camera.
The camera cannot assign location data in this state.
No relevant location data is registered in the smartphone.
Location data cannot be assigned to this picture.
Location data sent to the camera.
The camera does not support assignment of location data by NFC.
Location data cannot be assigned to this picture.
The SD card is write protected.
Using batch transfer may create duplicates of previously transferred pictures.
If howling occurs, lower the volume on your smartphone/tablet.
The recording has been stopped because the limits for the AVCHD standard have been reached.
Folder creation failed. Recording cannot be started.
The recording has been stopped because the memory is full.
The recording has been stopped due to a slower SD card writing speed.
The recording has been stopped because of overheating inside the camera.
The recording has been stopped because the recordable data size has been exceeded.
The SD card in use has many stored pictures that can cause operation instability.
When using continuous recording, as soon as 1 hour of continuous recording occurs, the beginning of the recording is erased to maintain a 1 hour recording.
"Video and audio output are stopped because video is being recorded. Touch the screen to close this message and return to shooting."
Cannot be used while using the Home Monitor function.
The white balance could not be set.
The white balance has been set.
"When using Home Cam feature please select “No”, because it's requires a 3G/4G data plan. (It's use is limited by your data plan.)"
No response from camera. Please check the camera.
"Live view on Wireless Twin Camera is stopping. To start live view, operate the camera."
"A problem has occurred with the Remote Pan Tilt Cradle. Check the Remote Pan Tilt Cradle."
The connection to the Remote Pan Tilt Cradle has been interrupted.
Delete selected images on LUMIX CLUB server?
An error occurred during communication with the server.
Not connected to the Internet. Select a connection method.
Transmission is not possible because the camera is connected via Wi-Fi Direct.
Delete selected files?(Protected files will not be deleted.)
Delete the selected file(s)? (Other file(s) recorded at the same time will also be deleted.)
Delete the selected file(s)? (Other file(s) recorded at the same time will also be deleted.) However, protected files will not be deleted.
"Copying was cancelled. Do not switch off the power."
Files were deleted from unsent image list.
Pictures in Camera Roll cannot be displayed. Enable [Location Services].
Could not continue playing the video in this application. Playback was stopped.
With high definition or long videos, playback may be interrupted or may not be possible.
Depending on your smartphone or tablet model, normal playback may not be possible.
Start uploading of all still pictures/videos.
\"Picture Share \" settings have not been completed. Perform these settings from the setup menu.
TV playback is not possible. An error has occurred on the TV.
TV playback is not possible. An error has occurred on the camera.
An error occurred while copying created highlights scene.
Failed to copy created highlights scene.
An error occurred during highlights creation.
Highlights cannot be created. Check the video camera.
Highlights creation failed. The selected BGM data are not compatible or are corrupted.
Highlights creation failed. The selected title picture data are not compatible or are corrupted.
Highlights cannot be created. There are no scenes that can be extracted.
Highlights cannot be created. The remaining capacity of the storage medium is insufficient.
Failed to delete created highlights scene.
An error occurred while sending parameters during highlights creation.
If the selected image is uploaded, old images will be deleted as the upload limit of the Cloud Sync. Service has been exceeded.
Cannot upload more images because the upload destination has reached its limit.
Cannot upload. Capacity on the Cloud Sync. Service server has reached its limit.
Cannot upload the selected image because it is too large.

"See the website of Google Analytics for details regarding the terms of use and privacy policy of Google Analytics. Google Analytics terms of use http://www.google.com/intl/ja/analytics/tos.html Google policy and general rules http://www.google.com/intl/ja/policies/privacy/
For inquiries, use the contact details listed in the terms of use."
"For inquiries, use the contact details listed in this app's terms of use."

"(1) This app retains a log of the user history of this app in the terminal that you are using and is equipped with a function to upload the user history to a server designated by Panasonic Corporation (hereinafter referred to as the Company). In order to provide software updates related to this app, make improvements to this app, increase functionality and customer convenience, and ensure smooth delivery of support services and technology to customers, technical information (including usage information such as recording, playback and transmissions) related to the customer's equipment, device, system, application software and peripheral equipment, as well as information related to this app's usage history and technical logs and associated information that are created and saved automatically when this app is used, may be collected and stored on the Company's specified servers, and used with methods that cannot be made to identify individual customers. For inquiries, use the contact details listed in the terms of use."

"(2) This app of Panasonic Corporation (hereinafter referred to as the Company) uses Google Analytics, a service provided by Google Inc. (hereinafter Google) to provide software updates related to this app, make improvements to this app, increase functionality and customer convenience, ensure smooth delivery of support services and technology to customers, and for marketing (sales promotion) purposes. When Google Analytics is used in this app, based on the cookie issued by the Company, technical information (including operating and usage information such as the display status of the screen view, recording, playback and transmissions) related to the customer's equipment, device, system, application software, peripheral equipment and connected devices, as well as information related to this app's usage history and technical logs and associated information, customer's country of residence or language used (hereinafter this information shall be referred to as \"customer information \") that are created and saved automatically when this app is used, are collected, recorded and analyzed automatically by Google. The Company receives the analysis results from Google to understand the customer information. Customer information collected, recorded and analyzed by Google Analytics does not contain information that identifies the customers individually. This information is also controlled by Google based on the privacy policy of the Google. "

"This app contains a function that maintains usage conditions of the device being used by the customer, and uploads it to Panasonic Corporation (hereinafter, this company). In order to provide software updates related to this app, make improvements to this app, increase functionality and customer convenience, and ensure smooth delivery of support services and technology to customers, technical information (including usage information such as recording, playback and transmissions) related to the customer's equipment, device, system, application software and peripheral equipment, as well as information related to this app's usage history and technical logs and associated information that are created and saved automatically when this app is used, are collected and stored on this company's specified servers, and used with methods that cannot be made to identify individual customers."
App usage conditions will be sent automatically to the server. This setting can be changed later.
